title: Dominion of the Eth
description: The collar would stay, for Rylis would never free Tamrin…Childhood memories of the Eth did no justice to what Rylis Tanyan would encounter in the depths of the Teeathun forest. But what he had treasured before had betrayed him, and now he must fight to escape the confines of the forest and his feelings for Tamrin, the Eth whom he’d loved long ago...
author: J.C. Owens
